name: SUNSOFT TECHNOLOGIES WELFARE ASSOCIATION
briefDescription: Presently we support Central Administrative Tribunal Bar Association, Allahabad & Bar Association of Revenue Board for setup of Digital Library for the welfare of Advocates. We coordinate them to receive fund from UP Government, Provide them technical details, arrange supply of Computers, Legal Database related to various judgement, all other hardware & infrastructure for setup of Digital Library. Presently we are monitoring & running their day to day Digital Library requirments & maintenance etc.We want to work in Health Sector. Want to setup Hospital for the needy people.
